name: Basic Package
description: The Basic Package provides essential features for efficient inventory management. Ideal for small businesses, it allows storage of up to 200 products in the inventory.

name: Standard Package
description: Upgrade to the Standard Package for comprehensive inventory control. Suited for growing businesses, it offers an expanded product limit of up to 450 items in the inventory.

name: Premium Package
description: Experience advanced features with the Premium Package, designed for robust inventory management. Perfect for large enterprises, it allows storage of up to 1500 products in the inventory.
